main event: A UFO was observed over Kirksville, Missouri on January 22, 1962, described as a bright silver object appearing round or oval at an altitude of 75,000 feet.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 65 minutes, it gained altitude reaching a maximum of around 105,000 feet, its speed was estimated between 1500 to 1600 mph with variations, the radar analysis suggested it was a balloon, and it faded from view while still under observation.
sighted object: bright silver round or oval object
witness description: observer who viewed the object for half of the total observation time
